resources.string: I need to access the camera for classification.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This will make your picture visible to the app developers. Are you sure?

Looks like you haven\'t got any dogs saved! Tap the camera icon to start, then save your prediction and see it here.\n\nTip: upload your prediction to our servers using the cloud icon if you want us to improve the accuracy! You can always delete it at any time.
